All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddAppointmentController
Controller that handles adding a valid appointment to the database.
AddCustomerController
Controller class that creates a new customer within the database.
Appointment
Class used in the reports page to populate the appointment table
AppointmentApplication
Class that starts the application
AppointmentDAO
DAO to access the appointments table.
Appointments
Model class for appointment objects representing the appointments table in the DB
AppointmentsDAO
Main DAO used for the appointments table.
ContactDAO
DAO using to retrieve information from the contact table.
Contacts
Contact Model Class for creating contacts and interacting with the DB.
Countries
Contries model class for interacting with the DB.
CountriesDAO
DAO used to access the countries table in the DB using JDBC
CustomerandAppointmentController
Main page of the application which display's customer and appointment data in TableViews.
CustomerDAO
DAO used to access the customer table and retrieve information using JDBC.
Customers
Model Customers class for interacting with the DB.
FirstLevelDivisionDAO
Controller used to access the first level divisions table in the DB.
FirstLevelDivisions
first_level_divisions model class for interacting with DB.
JDBC
Abstract class used to create the connection to the DB
LoginAlert
Alert class used in the Login Controller for incorrect logINs
LoginController
Controller that handles logIn functionality.
ModifyAppointmentController
Controller used to modify an existing appointment.
ModifyCustomerController
Controller used to modify the customer selected in the main page.
ReportsController
 
UserDao
DAO used to access the user table using JDBC.
Users
Users model class for interacting with DB.
